title: CUOMO’S NIPPLES, Quar Induced Divorce? 4.1.20
itunes:title: CUOMO’S NIPPLES, Quar Induced Divorce? 4.1.20
description:
In episode 599, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by comedian Billy Wayne Davis to discuss the Cuomo brothers, Caroline Calloway's long-waited response, divorce rates spiking, weather forecasts, the Mafia in Italy raising hell during the lockdown, Tiger King leading to the re-opening of the Don Lewis disappearance case, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. CNN Anchor Chris Cuomo Diagnosed With Coronavirus
  2. Pierced or Not? The Mystery Over New York Governor Andrew Cuomo’s Nipples
  3. Caroline Calloway's Long-Awaited 'Natalie Response' Essay Is Here
  4. China’s Divorce Spike Is a Warning to Rest of Locked-Down World
  5. Drop in aircraft observations could have impact on weather forecasts
  6. The Mafia’s Using the Italy Lockdown to Raise Hell and Recruit
  7. Netflix’s ‘Tiger King’ Sparks Flurry Of Tips In Florida Cold Case
  8. WATCH: Wild Nothing - Foyer

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
